https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/9BiIQoMlXMSfO2DGJqhd8t6YBNC.jpg Levan Koguashvili’s film — about a lonely 40-year-old schoolteacher who takes up with the wife of a soon-to-be-released convict — is a compassionate tragicomedy commenting on relationships and the profound emotional responsibilities they trigger. Blind Dates
